title: How To Contact Afterpay about Customer Care or Merchants Questions

steps.title: Afterpay no longer has a working helpline for customers.
steps.content: Afterpay no longer has a working helpline for customers. Although you used to be able to speak to a representative at Afterpay, due to the high call volume, their customer support numbers are no longer in service. Unfortunately, their Live Chat feature is also no longer available to use. [1] X Research source If you’re a merchant, however, you can still contact them by phone at 484-772-2736. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Go to the contact page on the Afterpay website.
steps.content: Go to the contact page on the Afterpay website. Open the Afterpay website for your home country (America, Canada, Australia, or New Zealand), then scroll down to the bottom of the page. Click “Contact.” [3] X Research source

steps.title: Click on the menu item for the issue you’re having.
steps.content: Click on the menu item for the issue you’re having. The page has options for refunds, returns, payment help, account management, general questions, ID verification, complaints, CCPA requests, unauthorized transaction reports, and setting spending limits. [4] X Research source

steps.title: Fill out the form with your information and turn it in.
steps.content: Fill out the form with your information and turn it in. Follow the prompts then write a short description of your request. You can also attach any relevant documents. For forms regarding orders, have your order number ready. [5] X Research source If you’re disputing a transaction, have the card that was used on hand. [6] X Research source If you’re a merchant, also include your merchant ID in the form. Depending on your issue and when you fill out the form, Afterpay may immediately respond or take up to a week to get back to you. Their customer service center is busiest on weekends and holidays, so expect to wait longer if you submit your request during those times.

steps.title: Send general questions to info@afterpay.
steps.content: Send general questions to info@afterpay. If you have a question about your account, want to talk to someone about changing your information, or have any nonlegal issues, email info@afterpay.com. [7] X Research source A ticket will be created for your request, and you should receive an email back within 24 hours.

steps.title: Email uslegal@afterpay for legal claims and disputes.
steps.content: Email uslegal@afterpay for legal claims and disputes. If you have a legal issue with one of the sellers, Afterpay asks you to initiate an informal negotiation between you and the seller at least 30 days before going to court. Send an email notice of the dispute to uslegal@afterpay.com. Include your name, account information, contact information, and a description of your dispute in the notice. [8] X Research source You can also send a paper copy to Afterpay US Services, LLC, 760 Market St. Floor 2 Unit 2.03, San Francisco, CA 94102. Write “Attention: Legal” on the envelope. [9] X Research source

steps.title: If you’re a merchant, send an email to merchantadminus@afterpay.
steps.content: If you’re a merchant, send an email to merchantadminus@afterpay. Go to the Afterpay Business Hub if you’re a seller. Click on “Get in Touch” at the bottom of the page. Pressing the button opens a message in your email app to merchantadminus@afterpay.com.

steps.title: Open the Afterpay main website and go to “Connect.”
steps.content: Open the Afterpay main website and go to “Connect.” Scroll down to the bottom of the Afterpay home page and find the “Connect” section. Click on Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, or LinkedIn. [10] X Research source

steps.title: Contact the account that corresponds to your home country.
steps.content: Contact the account that corresponds to your home country. Afterpay has different social media accounts for different countries. The US, UK, Australia, and New Zealand sites have Facebook and Instagram, the US and UK sites have Twitter, and the UK site also has a LinkedIn page. [11] X Research source Send the account a direct message with your issue. Customers have reported Afterpay responding to their DMs within a couple of days. The Facebook names for Afterpay are: Afterpay USA Afterpay (Australia’s page) Afterpay NZ Clearpay (the UK page) The Instagram Afterpay pages are: @afterpayusa @afterpayau @afterpaynz @clearpay_uk The US and UK Twitter accounts are @afterpayusa @clearpay The UK LinkedIn page is Clearpay (Afterpay)
